title: COHIBA
content:
the COHIBA type is probably custom, but something similar will do.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BrandCohiba.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311000326/http:/typophile.com/files/BrandCohiba.jpg) | 20.86 KB |
author: miles

comments.content: akzidenz grotesk bold extended is fairly close

Those COHIBA’s are tasty as hell by the way, definitely one of my favourites!

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*  
new release at [www.ourtype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20070311000326/http:/www.ourtype.com/) : Parry and Parry Grotesque

Artur,  
I concur.  
your Parry Grotesque looks damn tasty too.
nah… the C’s endings are horizontal on Titling Gothic… Akzidenz is still closer
